content.rendered:
Ryboa Haima proudly hosted its Annual Gathering, bringing together employees, stakeholders, and industry partners to reflect on the company’s achievements and set the course for future success. The event highlighted key milestones, including advancements in operational excellence, sustainability initiatives, and the company’s unwavering commitment to safety and innovation.

A major highlight of the evening was Ryboa Haima’s recognition for winning the Best Practice Award for the Enhanced Cutting Collection System (ECCS). This marks the third consecutive year that the company has been honored with a Best Practice Award, reinforcing its industry leadership and dedication to continuous improvement. The ECCS reflects Ryboa Haima’s commitment to optimizing waste management practices while upholding the highest environmental and safety standards.

The gathering also served as an opportunity to acknowledge the hard work and dedication of the entire Ryboa Haima team. Leadership emphasized the company’s vision for the future, focusing on growth, operational efficiency, and maintaining a strong culture of safety and sustainability. As Ryboa Haima moves forward, the company remains dedicated to driving innovation and excellence across all aspects of its operations.
